title: The royal wedding's one billion pound economy lift
text:
The royal wedding's one billion pound economy lift 11:56am GMT - 01:26 
The upcoming wedding of Britain's Prince Harry and his American fiancee Meghan Markle could be worth as much as one billion pounds ($1.38billion) to the UK economy according to one estimate. British luxury gift manufacturer Halcyon Days expects its sales to receive a boost of between 10 to 15 percent. Scarlett Cvitanovich reports.
